description: Weddings are going digital. Wedding trend watchers are seeing a big jump in couples who want to share their nuptials with the world in real time. Think handheld devices at destination weddings streaming to Grandma, who couldn't fly out. And a reminder that some people's Twitter musings are worth more than the Tweets of the rest of us.
